step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your arm straight overhead and feel the resistance. Ensure your shoulders are relaxed.
Excellent! Open your palm and fingers wide, feeling the stretch.
Great job opening your hand wide. Remember to relax your muscles as you exhale.
Well done making a fist and tightening your muscles while inhaling. Visualize the lymph flow.
Good second rep. Continue to keep the arm straight overhead and feel the resistance.
Nice work opening your hand wide again. Keep those fingers spread!
You're doing great opening your hand wide. Remember to relax and exhale fully.
Excellent final step! You made a strong fist while inhaling. Keep up the great work visualizing lymph flow.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the Overhead Pumping exercise! Remember to keep your arm straight overhead and open your hand wide while exhaling. Make a tight fist while inhaling. Keep visualizing the fluid moving out of your arm.
